bronze.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a hard metal that is a mixture of copper and tin
bronze.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the dark reddish brown colour of bronze
bronze.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a work of art such as a statue (=model of a person), made of bronze
bronze.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: King won a bronze in the 100-metres.
bronze.translation[1].definitions[1].def: having the dark reddish brown colour of bronze
